channel.title: Vagrant on pseudomuto.com

item.title: Running Rails Inside Vagrant
item.description: I use vagrant (along with chef, a vagrant plugin and my dotfiles) for my development environment. I do this for a number of reasons, but mostly, I find it’s the easiest way to get everything installed and configured properly regardless of which physical box I’m working on. There are a number of issues I needed to address to get this all working. One of those, was getting a simple rails server from inside the VM to be available from my host’s browser.
